abstract: Catherine Greig pleads guilty to criminal contempt for refusing to testify in case against Boston mobster and longtime boyfriend James (Whitey) Bulger, who is currently serving life sentence for racketeering.

headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Bulger’s Girlfriend Is Staying Silent
headline.main: Massachusetts: Bulger’s Girlfriend Is Staying Silent

snippet: The woman who spent 16 years on the run with the Boston mobster James “Whitey” Bulger pleaded guilty Wednesday to a criminal contempt charge for refusing to testify before a grand jury investigating whether other people helped him as a fugitive.
lead_paragraph: The woman who spent 16 years on the run with the Boston mobster James “Whitey” Bulger pleaded guilty Wednesday to a criminal contempt charge for refusing to testify before a grand jury investigating whether other people helped him as a fugitive.
